tool_description: Manages asset versioning including creating new versions, comparing versions, and maintaining version history.

operation.description: Version operation: create, compare, rollback, or list_versions

version_note.description: Description of changes for new versions

target_version.description: Specific version identifier for compare/rollback operations

error_messages: Asset not found: The specified asset_id does not exist.
Invalid operation: operation must be one of [create, compare, rollback, list_versions].
Version not found: The specified target_version does not exist for this asset.
Rollback failed: Cannot rollback to the specified version - check version availability.
Version creation failed: New version could not be created - check asset file integrity.
usage: Specify asset ID and operation type. For compare/rollback operations, provide target_version. Add version_note for create operations.

version_count.description: Total number of versions for this asset

operation_result.description: Result description of the requested operation

last_modified.description: Timestamp of last version change in ISO 8601 format
